jobDescription: Purpose, mastery, and autonomy. We provide all three at Rally Health (rallyhealth.com), a company that's revolutionizing population health and healthcare. Work for the purpose of improving millions of people's wellness and lifestyles. Help build and improve our platform of mission critical health applications. As a Senior Medical Coder working in the Clinical, Behavioral & Strategy Team, you will collaborate closely with the Data and Reporting teams to identify, define, measure, and improve the impact of Rally products on users’ lives.
